title: [Vigil's End, Encampment]
description: Skeletal remains of sizeable domed tents, some collapsed into haphazard piles of dry-rotted wood, are arranged in clusters across the roadside field.  Decaying furs and splintered kegs litter the exposed interiors.  Parched, sand-hued grasses obscure deserted, rusty weapons and reveal the occasional glint of a glaes armband.  Only a timeworn leather tent and a crooked hide-wrapped shelter stand intact, set on opposite sides of a burned-out firepit.
